definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[קשׁא]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. qu/i3=a0’un, Eth. q=isiy4t: NH [[קִשּׁוּת]], Pun. kissou Löw:p. 408, all cucumber (s) (Löw:p. 330), so prob. As. ḳiššû;; cf. Syr. qat.uwto0 id. (Lexx), Targum:Jer i. Nu 11:4 pl. [[קַטַּיׇּיא]] ([[ט]] for [[ת]] after [[ק]]); Gk. si/kuov siku/h Lag:arm. Stud. § 1975; M ii. 356 Lewy:Fremdw.30).
